item.title: People lose their stuff with reset please help
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Alright, this might not be the best way, but it’ll work.

First, in your PlayerHandler.java, declare:

public static int uptime;

Then, under

public void process() {

add:

uptime ++;

This means that every 500 milliseconds, the uptime integer you declared will increase by 1.

Still in public void process, add:

if (uptime >= 7080) { yell("Server is restarting in 1 minute!"); yell("Logout now so you don't lose anything!"); }
This means that if the uptime counter hits 7080 or higher (equivalent of 59 minutes since process ticks at 500ms), the server will send a message to all online players saying that the server is about to restart.
